description: Generate ALL THREE subsystems in one coordinated build: (1) Evaluation & Audit Suite v3 with clinical scoring, drift/bias detection, reasoning quality assessment, red-flag correctness, and multi-turn exam simulation; (2) Full Governance & Compliance Document Pack v1 including EU AI Act, ISO 27001, NIS2, DORA, GDPR, DPIA, Safety Case, Model Card, and downloadable PDF/ZIP bundle; (3) Artifact Unpacker Tool that converts agent_artifacts/*.json into real module folders in prep for v53 backend assembly. NO placeholders, NO stubs, NO TODOs.
requirements: Include multi-turn exam scenarios, species-specific validation, confidence stability scoring, consistency scoring, chain-of-thought quality heuristics, and PDF/JSON audit bundles.
Ensure integration with observability_engine and triage_orchestrator_v2 via correlation_id.
Generate FULL PDF versions using reportlab.
Bundle all PDFs + MDs into a single ZIP archive named petsage_compliance_bundle_v1.zip.
• Create real directories/modules in petsage-backend-v53/ structure
This allows one-command assembly of v53 backend after the 48h intelligence job completes.
Must support: observability_engine_v1_full_code.json, triage_orchestrator_v2_full_code.json, future eval suite JSONs.
Include architecture flow diagrams (ASCII or described) and v53 integration plan.
Write all code modules into agent_artifacts/eval_suite_v3_code/, agent_artifacts/compliance_pack_v1_docs/, and agent_artifacts/artifact_unpacker_v1_code/.
Commit all artifacts to GitHub repo petsage-backend.
Do NOT modify running backend or triage_engine.
Do NOT interfere with 48-hour intelligence run or mobile builder.
